about_the_game:
Dr. William, who unravels the secrets of an undiscovered element, forms a team of bounty hunters to seize this unique energy source. The team's mission is to collect these valuable elements that not only have the potential to produce unlimited energy but also cause supernatural beings to emerge. However, this challenging journey depends not only on courage and intelligence but also on the solidarity of the team.

Set in the dark and captivating atmosphere of the 19th century, Westfall takes players on a journey to the buried dark past of the Destined company, which has transformed into one of the greatest technology giants of the 22nd century with the unlimited energy sources it acquired in the past.

Get ready to discover the dangerous secrets behind the scenes by shedding light on the mysterious early years of the company!

Join the team of bounty hunters assembled by Dr. William and complete challenging missions. Use the money you earn to make your train more comfortable or invest in more effective equipment to chase bigger rewards. Make sure to collect the targeted amount of valuable gems on the last day of the cycle!

While fighting against tough AI enemies, your team will be your greatest strength. You can purchase functional tools such as a flashlight, radio, bomb, stealth equipment, or revival stone on your train for a more effective team. Alternatively, you can organize the train to boost your team's motivation and make it more appealing. Remember, keeping your team's morale high is crucial to overcoming challenges.

In a town that you will only visit at night like experienced bounty hunters, you will have limited time to move unnoticed. Complete your mission within the given time and make sure you leave no one behind from your team!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has realistic graphics and atmosphere. Players can die in various situations and be torn apart with realistic blood effects. Alcohol and tobacco are smoked in some scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5800x3d / Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Westfall is a cooperative/collaborative horror game where you collect precious stones from cursed towns of the wild west.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
